channel.title: No commands work if teleblocked

item.title: No commands work if teleblocked
item.dc:creator: @Benz Benz
item.description:
@Benz wrote:

adamp40:

using a teleblock = 0 void and teleblock =1 is more efficaint

firewithin3:

I lol’d irl… That’s not a void, that’s not even an integer because it doesn’t end in a ;. How the hell did you get 27 rep if you know this little about java?

Actually, abstract voids do end in a semicolon. Adamp40 was talking about something like this:

int teleblock;
if(teleblock == 1) {
doThis();
} else {
doThat();
}

It is an integer, he just didn’t make a statement.

Read full topic
